TechStack.title: Technologies
TechStack.subtitle: Some of the technologies I specialize in.

react.description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces

cogiweb.title: Developer Analyst
achievements: Participated in transitioning a C# monolithic application to modern web technologies
Maintained and improved a legacy C# application
Created internal tools to accelerate team development and productivity
Resolved production bugs, ensuring service stability and reliability

ramq.title: Workforce Management Technician
achievements: Responsible for preparing and recovering computer equipment for incoming and outgoing employees
Provided fast and reliable technical support to employees

go-tcp-server.title: Go TCP Server
go-tcp-server.description: Concurrent chat server in Go enabling real-time communication between multiple clients, featuring an integrated queue system and mini guessing game.

evalupro.title: EvaluPro
evalupro.description: Web application for product evaluation with a multi-criteria rating system. Users can search, compare and evaluate products according to different roles (visitor, user, tester, admin).

trello-clone.title: Trello Clone
trello-clone.description: Kanban-style task management application. Features boards, lists and cards with deadline filtering and drag-and-drop functionality.

nextjs-calendar.title: Next.js Calendar
nextjs-calendar.description: Calendar with real-time synchronization between devices via WebSocket. Enables creation, modification and deletion of events with PostgreSQL persistence.
